TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegisteredWaitHandle extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class RegisteredWaitHandle Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class RegisteredWaitHandle sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 表示在调用 时已注册的句柄。

span.span: Represents a handle that has been registered when calling .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来确定调用回调方法的原因, 以及如何在回调由于等待句柄发出信号而发生回调时取消注册任务。The following example shows how to use a to determine why a callback method is called, and how to unregister a task if the callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 该示例还演示了如何使用方法在指定的等待句柄收到信号时执行指定的回调方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此示例中, 回调方法为`WaitProc`, 等待句柄是。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 该示例定义了`TaskInfo`一个类, 用于保存在执行时传递给回调的信息。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 该示例创建一个`TaskInfo`对象, 并为其分配一些字符串数据。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 方法返回的将分配`TaskInfo`给对象的字段,以便回调方法有权访问。`Handle` The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了`TaskInfo`指定作为要传递给回调方法的对象, 对方法的调用还指定了任务将`WaitProc`等待的, 委托表示回调方法,1秒的超时间隔和多个回调。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 当主线程通过调用其方法发出信号时, 将调用委托。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法测试以确定是否发生了超时。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果回调是由于等待句柄已发出信号而调用的`WaitProc` , 则该方法将注销, 并停止其他回调。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在超时情况下, 任务将继续等待。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法通过将消息打印到控制台来结束。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console. summary.span: 在垃圾回收将某一对象回收前允许该对象尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Unregister(class System.Threading.WaitHandle waitObject) cil managed
Public Function Unregister (waitObject As WaitHandle) As Boolean

summary.span: 取消由 方法发出的已注册等待操作。

span.span: Cancels a registered wait operation issued by the method.

returns.span: 如果函数成功，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`waitObject`已指定, 则只有在成功注销后才会发出信号。If `waitObject` is specified, it is signaled only if the is successfully unregistered. 如果在执行时回调方法正在进行, `waitObject`则在回调方法完成之前不会发出信号。If a callback method is in progress when executes, `waitObject` is not signaled until the callback method completes. 具体而言, 如果回调方法执行, `waitObject`则在回调方法完成之前不会发出信号。In particular, if a callback method executes , `waitObject` is not signaled until that callback method completes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法取消注册, 因为在等待句柄终止的情况下发生回调。The following example shows how to use the method to unregister a task if a callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 该示例还演示了如何使用方法在指定的等待句柄收到信号时执行指定的回调方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此示例中, 回调方法为`WaitProc`, 等待句柄是。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 该示例定义了`TaskInfo`一个类, 用于保存在执行时传递给回调的信息。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 该示例创建一个`TaskInfo`对象, 并为其分配一些字符串数据。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 方法返回的将分配`TaskInfo`给对象的字段,以便回调方法有权访问。`Handle` The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了`TaskInfo`指定作为要传递给回调方法的对象, 对方法的调用还指定了任务将`WaitProc`等待的, 委托表示回调方法,1秒的超时间隔和多个回调。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 当主线程通过调用其方法发出信号时, 将调用委托。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法测试以确定是否发生了超时。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果回调是由于等待句柄已发出信号而调用的`WaitProc` , 则该方法将注销, 并停止其他回调。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在超时情况下, 任务将继续等待。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法通过将消息打印到控制台来结束。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console.
